name: @bufbuild/protoc-gen-es
description: Protocol Buffers code generator for ECMAScript

scripts.build:binary: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cjs/src/entry.js --targets node20-win-x64,node20-linux-x64,node20-macos-x64 --out-path . && mv entry-win.exe bin/protoc-gen-es-win.exe && mv entry-linux bin/protoc-gen-es-linux && mv entry-macos bin/protoc-gen-es-macos
scripts.build:binary:win: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cjs/src/entry.js --targets node20-win-x64 --out-path . && mv entry-win.exe bin/protoc-gen-es-win.exe
scripts.build:binary:linux: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cjs/src/entry.js --targets node20-linux-x64 --out-path . && mv entry-linux bin/protoc-gen-es-linux
scripts.build:binary:macos: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cjs/src/entry.js --targets node20-macos-x64 --out-path . && mv entry-macos bin/protoc-gen-es-macos
